SEARCH
Package io.rhythmknights.coreapi.component.module

Interface DynamicTitle

All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicTitle.DynamicTitleImpl, DynamicTitle.InteractionDynamicTitle, DynamicTitle.PaginatedDynamicTitle
public interface DynamicTitle
Interface for handling dynamic titles in modals Allows for titles to be updated based on the current state of the modal

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    DynamicTitle.DynamicTitleImpl
    Simple implementation for creating dynamic titles with a function
    static class 
    DynamicTitle.InteractionDynamicTitle
    Implementation for updating titles based on item interactions
    static class 
    DynamicTitle.InteractionState
    Data class for interaction state
    static class 
    DynamicTitle.PaginatedDynamicTitle
    Implementation for paginated modals that shows current page / total pages
    static class 
    DynamicTitle.PaginationState
    Data class for pagination state
